short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Searches Ebay for sold items based on highlighted text with context menu. UK Version

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds an item to the context menu that searches eBay UK for items marked as sold that match the text that the user highlights on a webpage. The user highlights the text on a webpage; then, they right-click to bring up the context menu and choose "Search eBay for sold items" in the context menu. A new browser tab opens to the eBay search page, displaying their results.
